item.description:
Learn about this Personality Typing System of 6 Learning Styles and where you fit, your strengths and limitations within the perceptual filters of auditory, visual or kinesthetic processing. How do you take in information for those three areas differently than the other 5 types?

Learn more about yourself and how others are different and how to communicate more effectively to the other 5 types. Add this tool to others you might know, Enneagram, Myers-Briggs or Astrology.

7 to 9:30/10pm

There's a sliding scale from $20-40. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $20, it helps the presenter and those who might pay less. No one is turned away because of money, so pay what you can honestly afford.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcome to bring vegetarian appetizers and drinks, including wine.

***** About Herb Pearce ******

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., has been teaching personality systems for 20 years and has been a psychotherapist for 30 years, having worked with thousands of individuals, couples and families, as well as teams in corporations and agencies. Author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, he has also taught different personality systems to explain the unique flavor of how people experience life.


www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737
check out Herb's workshop also at www.meetup.com/The-Arlington-Singles-Events
item.name: 6 Learning Styles - Auditory, Visual and Kinesthetic Differences
